text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Dell Inspiron 15 Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (7th Gen Intel Core i5 Quad Core, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 Inch Ful HD 1920 x 1080 Display, NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB, Win 10 Home) VR Ready!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Dell Inspiron 15 Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (7th Gen Intel Core i5 Quad Core, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 Inch Ful HD 1920 x 1080 Display, NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. The build quality of the Dell Inspiron 15 Premium Gaming and Business Laptop (7th Gen Intel Core i5 Quad Core, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 Inch Ful HD 1920 x 1080 Display, NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB, Win 10 Home) VR Ready is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

A definite 5 stars!
